Class Connect4View

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Connect4View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    public class Connect4View
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is the view in the MVC architecture for a connect 4 game. This class holds all the methods to create a GUI for the user to view and interact with. The color of the pieces is as follows: Player 1 = red Player 2 = yellow Player 1 will be the server and player 2 will be the client
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christopher Crabtree, Luke Cernetic
